page.title: 07Attitudes / Customs
page.content:
Some of the villages think that there should be more recreation for children. Others think that the dog handling classes as the play group for hygene reasons.
Some of the customs in Ebberston include tieing the gates at church wedding and not undoimg them until money is thrown a you by people at the wedding. You are supposed to fall in the beck before you become a true Ebberstonian, but this does not count unless you were born in the village to strt with. Rolling eggs down a certain hill at Easter is another custom.
